HeroSection.title: Discover the Soul of Morocco
HeroSection.subtitle: Authentic journeys through the stunning landscapes and rich culture of the Souss-Massa region.

FeaturedExperiences.title: Featured Experiences
FeaturedExperiences.genericError: An error occurred while loading experiences.

WhyChooseUs.title: Why Travel With Us?
WhyChooseUs.feature1_desc: Our guides are born and raised in Morocco, offering you unparalleled insight and access to authentic experiences.
WhyChooseUs.feature2_desc: We don't do 'one-size-fits-all'. Every trip is crafted around your interests, budget, and travel style.
WhyChooseUs.feature3_desc: Travel with complete peace of mind. Our team is available around the clock to ensure your journey is seamless.

AboutSection.title: Our Story
AboutSection.subtitle: More than just tours, we offer genuine connections to the heart of Morocco.
AboutSection.paragraph1: Founded by local experts with a passion for sharing the authentic beauty of the Souss-Massa region, our mission is to create unforgettable travel memories. We believe in responsible tourism that supports local communities and showcases the rich culture and stunning landscapes of our home.
AboutSection.paragraph2: From the majestic peaks of the Atlas Mountains to the serene sands of the Sahara, every journey with us is more than a vacation—it's an adventure woven with genuine human connection.
AboutSection.imageAlt: A vibrant scene of a traditional Moroccan tagine being prepared.
AboutSection.valuesSubtitle: These principles guide every journey we craft, ensuring an experience that is authentic, respectful, and unforgettable.
AboutSection.value1_desc: We connect you with real people and places, offering a true taste of Moroccan life beyond the typical tourist trails.
AboutSection.value2_desc: Our tours are designed to honor local traditions, support communities, and preserve the delicate environment we explore.
AboutSection.value3_desc: We love what we do. Our passion for Morocco's culture and landscapes is the magic ingredient in every trip we plan.
AboutSection.teamSubtitle: Our team is our greatest asset. They are local experts, storytellers, and your personal connection to the authentic heart of Morocco.
AboutSection.team1_bio: Born in the Atlas Mountains, Hassan has been guiding treks for over 15 years. His knowledge of the local trails and Berber culture is second to none.
AboutSection.team2_bio: Fatima shares her passion for Moroccan cuisine and history, leading our city tours and cooking classes with warmth and expertise.
AboutSection.team3_bio: From a nomadic family, Youssef knows the desert like the back of his hand. He leads our 4x4 and camel trekking adventures.
AboutSection.ctaButton: Contact Us to Plan Your Trip

ContactSection.alertSuccess: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you shortly.

Footer.aboutText: Crafting authentic, unforgettable journeys through the heart of Morocco. Discover the real Souss-Massa region with local experts.

ReviewsList.title: Guest Reviews
ReviewsList.noReviews: No reviews yet. Be the first to share your experience!

ReviewsPage.reviewsComingSoonText: We are gathering valuable feedback to share with you soon. Check back for authentic experiences!
ReviewsPage.reviewDefaultComment1: A fantastic experience from start to finish. The team was professional, and the sights were unforgettable. Highly recommended!
ReviewsPage.reviewDefaultComment2: We had a great time. Everything was well-organized. We'll be back for another tour next year!
ReviewsPage.reviewAdventureComment1: An absolutely epic adventure! The guides knew the terrain like the back of their hand and were super encouraging. The views from the summit were worth every step.
ReviewsPage.reviewAdventureComment2: This wasn't just a tour; it was a real expedition. Pushed my limits in the best way possible. Safe, thrilling, and 100% authentic.
ReviewsPage.reviewLuxuryComment1: The definition of bespoke travel. Every detail was flawlessly executed. The private riad was an oasis, and our guide was incredibly insightful. We felt like royalty.
ReviewsPage.reviewLuxuryComment2: Our desert experience was nothing short of magical. The luxury camp exceeded all expectations. It was the perfect blend of high-end comfort and profound tranquility.

FaqPage.faqComingSoonText: We are compiling a list of frequently asked questions to assist you. Please check back soon!
FaqPage.faqDefaultQuestion1: How do I book a tour?
FaqPage.faqDefaultAnswer1: You can book directly through our website by selecting your desired tour and clicking 'Book Now'. You can also contact us via email or WhatsApp, and our team will be happy to assist you with your booking.
FaqPage.faqDefaultAnswer2: We offer a full refund for cancellations made at least 7 days before the tour date. Cancellations made 3-6 days before receive a 50% refund. Unfortunately, we cannot offer refunds for cancellations made within 48 hours of the tour.
FaqPage.faqDefaultQuestion3: What payment methods do you accept?
FaqPage.faqDefaultAnswer3: We accept major credit cards (Visa, MasterCard, American Express) through our secure online payment gateway. We also accept bank transfers and cash payments in Moroccan Dirhams (MAD) upon arrival for certain tours.
FaqPage.faqAdventureQuestion1: What level of physical fitness is required?
FaqPage.faqAdventureAnswer1: Our adventure tours range from easy (light walking) to strenuous (multi-day trekking). Each tour page has a 'Difficulty' rating. Please read this carefully to ensure the tour matches your fitness level. When in doubt, contact us!
FaqPage.faqAdventureAnswer2: Your safety is our absolute priority. All our adventure guides are certified in first-aid and have extensive experience in the local terrain. We use modern, well-maintained equipment and follow strict safety protocols.
FaqPage.faqAdventureQuestion3: What should I pack for a desert or mountain trek?
FaqPage.faqAdventureAnswer3: We recommend packing in layers: breathable shirts, a warm fleece or jacket for the evenings, comfortable hiking shoes, a hat, sunglasses, and high-SPF sunscreen. A reusable water bottle is a must. We will provide a detailed packing list upon booking.
FaqPage.faqLuxuryQuestion1: Can my entire trip be customized?
FaqPage.faqLuxuryAnswer1: Absolutely. Customization is the heart of our luxury service. We design itineraries from the ground up based on your unique interests, pace, and preferences. Consider our listed tours as inspiration, not limitations.
FaqPage.faqLuxuryQuestion2: What kind of accommodations do you use?
FaqPage.faqLuxuryAnswer2: We partner exclusively with a curated selection of 5-star hotels, luxury riads, and high-end desert camps known for their exceptional service, exquisite design, and authentic character. We prioritize properties that offer both comfort and a true sense of place.
FaqPage.faqLuxuryQuestion3: What makes your private tours different?
FaqPage.faqLuxuryAnswer3: Our private luxury tours guarantee your exclusivity. You will have a dedicated expert guide and a private, premium air-conditioned vehicle (like a Mercedes V-Class or Toyota Prado) for your party alone. This allows for ultimate flexibility to adjust your schedule, explore off-the-beaten-path locations, and travel at your own pace.

AgencyHero.title: Your Adventure Awaits
AgencyHero.subtitle: Surf the Atlantic coast, trek the Atlas Mountains, or explore the Sahara desert. We offer authentic, expertly-guided excursions for every thrill-seeker.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.text: {officialName} ('we', 'us') is committed to protecting your personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our website ({brandName}.com) and our services, in compliance with Moroccan Law No. 09-08.

dataController.title: 2. Data Controller
dataController.text: {officialName} is the 'Data Controller' responsible for your personal data collected through this website.

dataCollected.title: 3. Data We Collect
dataCollected.intro: We may collect the following data:

points.label: Data you provide:
points.text: Your name, email address, phone number, and the number of guests when you fill out a booking or contact form.

points.label: Payment Data:
points.text: We use Stripe to process payments. We do not store your credit card details. Your payment data is handled by Stripe.

points.label: Automatic Data:
points.text: Your IP address, browser type, and how you use our site (via simple analytics) to help us improve our service.

howWeUseData.title: 4. How We Use Your Data
howWeUseData.intro: We use your data for the following purposes:

points.label: To Fulfill Your Booking:
points.text: To process your reservation, manage your itinerary, and provide you with transport and guide services.

points.label: To Communicate With You:
points.text: To send you booking confirmations, itinerary details, and respond to your questions.

points.label: To Improve Our Service:
points.text: To understand how our website is used so we can make it better.

dataSharing.title: 5. Data Sharing
dataSharing.intro: We do not sell your personal data. We only share it when necessary:

points.label: With Service Partners:
points.text: We may share your name with a hotel we are booking on your behalf or with a specific guide.

points.label: With Payment Processors:
points.text: We share payment information with Stripe to complete your transaction.

dataRetention.title: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.text: We retain your personal data only for as long as necessary to fulfill the services we promised and to comply with our legal obligations (e.g., for tax purposes).

yourRights.title: 7. Your Rights (Law 09-08)
yourRights.intro: Under Moroccan law, you have the right to:

points.label: Access:
points.text: Request a copy of the personal data we hold about you.

points.label: Rectification:
points.text: Request that we correct any inaccurate data.

points.label: Erasure:
points.text: Request that we delete your personal data.

points.label: Object:
points.text: Object to the processing of your data for legitimate reasons.

yourRights.outro: To exercise these rights, please contact us at: {email}. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the CNDP (Morocco's data protection commission).

cookies.title: 8. Cookies
cookies.text: We use essential cookies for our site to function and analytical cookies to improve our service. You can manage your consent via our cookie banner.

policyUpdates.title: 9. Policy Updates
policyUpdates.text: We may update this policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated 'Last Updated' date.

contactUs.title: 10. Contact Us
contactUs.text: If you have any questions, please contact us at: {email}.

agreement.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreement.text: By accessing our website ({brandName}.com) or booking a service with us, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. 'We' or 'us' refers to {officialName}.

services.title: 2. Our Services
services.text: We provide tour operator services, including (but not limited to) airport transfers, multi-day circuits, hotel reservations, and private guide services ('Services'). All services are subject to availability and confirmation.

points.label: Bookings:
points.text: A booking is only considered confirmed after we receive the required deposit and you receive a written confirmation from us.

points.label: Payments:
points.text: A deposit (e.g., 50%) is required to secure your booking. The final balance is due on a specified date before the trip or upon arrival, as stated in your booking confirmation.

points.label: Payment Methods:
points.text: We accept payments via Stripe (credit card) and bank transfer. All transactions are secure.

cancellationsRefunds.title: 4. Cancellations & Refunds
cancellationsRefunds.intro: This is the most critical section. You must define this clearly with your brother. Here is a common, professional policy:

subsections.title: Cancellation by You:
points: Cancellations made more than 30 days before the tour start date: Full refund of your deposit.
Cancellations made 15-29 days before: 50% refund of your deposit.
Cancellations made less than 14 days before: No refund of the deposit.

subsections.title: Cancellation by Us:
subsections.text: We reserve the right to cancel a tour at any time due to unforeseen circumstances (e.g., natural disasters, safety concerns). In this event, you will receive a 100% full refund.

points.label: Travel Insurance:
points.text: You are required to purchase comprehensive travel insurance before your trip. This insurance must cover (at a minimum) medical emergencies, personal injury, and cancellation. We are not liable for any incidents not covered by your insurance.

points.label: Documents:
points.text: You are responsible for ensuring your passport, visa, and any other travel documents are valid for your trip to Morocco.

liability.title: 6. Liability
liability.text: {officialName} acts as an agent for hotels, transport providers, and other contractors. We are not liable for any injury, damage, loss, accident, delay, or irregularity that may occur due to the act or default of any company or person engaged in conveying the passenger or in carrying out the arrangements of the tour. We are not responsible for delays or issues caused by 'force majeure' (e.g., weather, strikes, political unrest).

itineraryChanges.title: 7. Itinerary Changes
itineraryChanges.text: We will make every effort to adhere to the confirmed itinerary. However, we reserve the right to make changes to the itinerary (e.g., order of sights, change of hotel) if necessary due to local conditions, weather, or other unforeseen circumstances to ensure your safety and comfort.

governingLaw.title: 8. Governing Law
governingLaw.text: These terms are governed by the laws of the Kingdom of Morocco. Any dispute shall be settled in the competent courts of Marrakech (or Agadir).
